title: Authentication token expired error loops infinitely
description: When a user's JWT expires while they are on the dashboard, the API intercepts the 401 and attempts to refresh. However, if the refresh token is also invalid, it goes into an infinite redirect loop between /login and /dashboard.
logs:
Error: Refresh token invalid
Redirecting to /login
Redirecting to /dashboard
...
expectedBehavior: User should be logged out and redirected to /login exactly once.

title: Payment gateway webhook failing for non-US currencies
description: The Stripe webhook endpoint fails to parse the currency code when processing payments in EUR or GBP, resulting in a 500 error and unfulfilled orders.
logs: TypeError: Cannot read properties of undefined (reading 'toUpperCase')
expectedBehavior: Webhook should successfully parse and store any supported currency.

title: Mobile navigation menu overlaps content on small screens
description: On devices with width < 375px, the hamburger menu dropdown z-index is lower than the hero section image, making links unclickable.
expectedBehavior: Navigation menu should overlay all content.

title: Memory leak in background video processing worker
description: The FFmpeg worker node gradually consumes RAM over 24 hours until OOM kill. Seems related to lingering buffer references.
logs: FATAL ERROR: Ineffective mark-compacts near heap limit Allocation failed - JavaScript heap out of memory
expectedBehavior: Memory usage should remain stable under continuous load.
